name: Memoir
description:
Explore a mythical ancient castle and solve puzzles to unfold the secrets of a deer people civilization.

Memoir is a puzzle game that reveals a story of a mythical ancient castle as you solve along. Guide the little deer kin as she wakes up at the entrance of a mythical ancient castle without memories.

  • Classic push the block puzzles with a twist
  • Merge and eliminate blocks by merging them together to fit what the puzzle needs
  • Featuring more than 60+ puzzle levels
  • 6 beautifully hand drawn ruins of a deer people civilization in different themes to explore
